mapper.sql: uuid, name, url, organization_uuid as organizationUuid, project_uuid as projectUuid, secret, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt
mapper.select: select from webhooks where organization_uuid = #{organizationUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by name asc
select from webhooks where project_uuid = #{projectUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by name asc
mapper.insert: insert into webhooks ( uuid, name, url, organization_uuid, project_uuid, secret, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
